item.title: CCL
item.description: score:-13 Chances: Carnival has experienced a stunning comeback from cancelled cruises, surpassing previous sales records and achieving growth. Record quarterly bookings and increasing demand have contributed to Carnival’s growth trajectory. Exclusive partnerships with renowned chefs and new gourmet dining experiences could enhance the company’s appeal.
